text: Nothing in this chapter or any rules or regulations issued pursuant to this chapter shall be construed to compel a person with cancer to submit to medical examination or treatment.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 6-1303.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-83, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-301.

DC CODE § 7-303

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Reports of Cancer and Malignant Neoplastic Diseases.

heading.catch_text: Medical examination or treatment not required.
